Class CardInput

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.softeng.is25am10.model.cards.CardInput
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class CardInput extends Object implements Serializable
This class contains the input gave by the player to the cards. It contains all the possible data about the player choice. It also accepts disconnected players.
